brief.title: The leading company in the real estate market
brief.paragraph1: Our aspiration is to create living, vibrant and integrated communities and to enhance the quality of life for those living in and visiting the Middle East.

list.i2: Building a modern way of living
list.i3: Led by people, driven by passion, delivered with pride

brief.paragraph2: We will do this by continuing to provide market-leading lifestyle destinations for tenants and customers alike.

i1.title: We Like to Listen
i1.desc: We listen, find out what you want to achieve and plan how we get you there. Things work better when we do it together.

i2.title: We Like to Talk
i2.desc: We'll keep you updated with the progress of the market. We'll earn your trust and make the process stress-free.

i3.title: We Make it Easy
i3.desc: We love a challenge. We'll talk to you about it in plain English. You'll find us honest, reliable and a safe pair of hands.

overview.title: Overview
overview.text: With over a decade of experience as an agent, Scott is passionate about professionalising the way real estate agents do business in his area. His experienced team is focussed on quality of service to selected clients- not minimum of service to many clients. With the market's highest list-to-sell ratio and shortest average days on market, they focus on delivering results every time through a marketing based model designed to ensure that every property is sold to the ideal buyer or leased to the ideal tenant. The team has built a continually growing repeat client base by emphasizing the outcome for the client above all else, resulting in a level of service unrivalled in their market. Contact them to understand how they do it, or ask to see their long list of testimonials.

reviews.title: Agent Reviews
reviews.text1: We were referred to Scott through our close friends and are so happy with the service he provided! This was our first house, so we had a lot of questions and he was happy to answer them all!
reviews.text2: Beautiful home, very picturesque and close to everything in jtree! A little warm for a hot weekend, but would love to come back during the cooler seasons!

list.i1: It's always a pleasure to work with Jaber company and their team. They are personable, responsive, and results-oriented!
list.i2: Their guidance and advice was invaluable in purchasing this home which easily exceeded my expectations...the whole family was thrilled!
list.i3: Jaber company is attentive, personable, and professional. John and his team provide great support for my company's needs.
list.i4: Always available to answer any questions. Very knowledgeable about the services they provide. Would recommend to anyone!
list.i5: Greatest appreciation to you and your team for the outstanding job you did for us. The house is just what we wanted, and we were thrilled with the speed your team done!

propertyDetailsPage.title: Luxury Villa in Spain's Balearic Islands

desc.title: Description
desc.text: Planned after the principles of Spanish architecture, its layout enables you to entertain with aplomb and be the perfect host while safeguarding your privacy. For instance, its entrance is positioned so that your guests can access your living area and its accompanying lawn directly, without having to traverse your family’s personal spaces. Seamlessly skirted by grassy paths, it blurs the line between the outdoors and in, enveloping you in nature’s warm embrace. With seven spacious bedrooms as well as a maid’s room, large balcony decks opening from the bedrooms, a central family area, and a commodious kitchen, it promises you a life that is convenient and comfortable even as it is elegant and classy.
